title: Did Jeff Rothschild, CEO of Facebook, say, "We need a third world war"?
subtitle: The former vice president on Facebook is supposed to be in favour of solving global problems through the extermination of 90% of human beings.
author: David Emery
vclaim: "In order to complete the process of the new world order, we need a third world war to exterminate 90% of the world's population."
